content: more shaped for the right ear you need to change row 5 just slightly for right ear 5 chain 1 half_double_crochet in first stitch single_crochet in next 13 stitches slip_stitch in next 8 sl sts half_double_crochet in next stitch half_double_crochet in next stitch do not join at end of round but continue to work in rounds this pattern is copyright 2008 by nichole m verville this pattern may not be sold you may sell the finished product from this pattern as long as i am credited for the pattern you may use this pattern as long as i am credited for the pattern
